body:
How to treat a pedophile:
-burn the extremities (fingers and toes), crush the bones in it and cut them, phalanx by phalanx (immediately stop excessive bleeding to avoid a premature death)
-burn the skin on the arms and legs, crush the bones in it and amputate them  so that only the torso remains
-burn the balls with low fire, crush and tear them off, do the same with the penis
-put a metal dildo up the ass and send in electricity (low voltage and quick discharges to avoid heart arrest and premature death)
-tear off the nipples
-burn the eyes
-remove the teeth
-cut the tongue
-cut the ears and pierce the eardrums
-burn what remains of the "victim" with low fire
-throw away the body and if still alive, put on honey so that wild animals and insects finish the job
Don't forget to record everything and spread the video as an example, medieval style with modern means, pretty effective
This is the best doujin I ever read from story and the feels, I feel wanna cry like a baby
i thought the guy that fuck her every day gonna marry her some day but WTF the artist make it like he lived her on the internet and get caught up by the police ~~ this suck very suck
Vanilla gay boys have to ruin the fun for everyone
Lots of social justice fappers here i say...
@Everyone what pisses me off the most is that so many of the best artists almost exclusively seem to draw rape/NTR doujins. Whhyyy
@Rance-sama you're right, but comparing NTR with scat in term of 'likeablity' is a little bit too much I think.
Why do people like things like scat, bestiality and yaoi? Different tastes, don't act like a vanillafag on a NTR doujin.
how the fuck do you guys fap with tears? How the hell does ANYONE enjoy NTR, actually?
